messages.message: Can we considering having the ability to pass a specific page in the the model. This would allow me to find the location of a table with a question then pass that page in for a better outcome.
@lydia this is interesting and a case we can support if we stored documents in our new format :slightly_smiling_face:
it would be really cool if we can ask GPT to figure out where information might be located in the doc and then specifically pass that page context to get a better result for long docs.
